overviewQuestions:
Have questions? Check out the [FAQ](/static/faq/)! If your question isn't mentioned there, you can ask for further help in the [Habitica Help guild](/groups/guild/5481ccf3-5d2d-48a9-a871-70a7380cee5a).

Good luck with your tasks!
